-- Microphone!! --
-- Have a handle to the game service in case we need to get the time object r = game:service("RunService")
-- Tool and the Object, in this case Microphone local Microphone = script.Parent.Handle local Tool = script.Parent
-- Just a partial lock, which disallows multiple instances of the onActivated function Tool.Enabled = true
local BBAnim = nil local fakeMic = nil
-- Create an instance of the beatbox music that is stored in the server and append it to the microphone object local BeatboxS = Instance.new("Sound") BeatboxS.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=45503715" BeatboxS.Parent = Tool BeatboxS.Volume = 1.0 -- Just to fiddle with the Volume values
local MaleS = Instance.new("Sound") MaleS.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=45517845" MaleS.Parent = Tool MaleS.Volume = 1.0
local FemaleS = Instance.new("Sound") FemaleS.SoundId = "http://roblox.com/asset/?id=45517873" FemaleS.Parent = Tool FemaleS.Volume = 1.0
-- Array to hold the songs local AllSongs = {BeatboxS, MaleS, FemaleS}
-- Actions to do when an item is activated function onActivated() -- Tentative lock, to disable multiple instances of this function if not Tool.Enabled then return end -- Check if the handle to the Player is still available in the space local MyPlayer = Tool.Parent if MyPlayer == nil then return end
local MyRightArm = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if MyRightArm == nil then return end
local MyTorso = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if MyTorso == nil then return end
-- Check to see if the humanoid is still in the world local MyHumanoid= MyPlayer:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if MyHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
-- Load the Animation BBAnim = MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.BeatBox) -- Play Animation BBAnim:Play()
-- Play the Music! AllSongs[math.random(1, #AllSongs)]:Play()
--[[ This massive chunk of code is used to animate the Microphone model to move with the hand This is done after playing through with the values with the Editor and knowing how the timings of the Animation look]]
fakeMic = Tool.Handle:Clone() fakeMic.CanCollide = false fakeMic.Parent = game.Workspace Tool.Handle.Transparency = 1
local newWeld = Instance.new("Weld") newWeld.Part1 = MyTorso newWeld.Part0 = fakeMic newWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(1.5, .3, -1.5)) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) newWeld.Parent = MyTorso
for i = 1.5,-1.5, -0.3 do -- Playing with the editor, we already know that we need to move only the Y part newWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(i, .3, -1.5)) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) wait(0.1) end wait(.75) -- 2nd position for i = -1.5, 0, 0.3 do --Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, i, 0.2) newWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(i, .3, -1.5)) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) --Tool.GripPos = MyRightArm.CFrame:vectorToObjectSpace(MyTorso.CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(i, .3, -1.5)) + MyRightArm.Position - MyTorso.Position) wait(0.1) end wait(3) -- 3rd position for i = 0, -1.0, -0.2 do newWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(i, .3, -1.5)) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) wait(0.1) end -- 4th position for i = -1.0, 0.5, .12 do newWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(i, .3, -1.5)) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) wait(0.1) end fakeMic:remove() Tool.Handle.Transparency = 0
wait(3)
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() for i =1,#AllSongs do AllSongs[i].Volume = 1 end end
function onUnequipped() for i=1, #AllSongs do AllSongs[i].Volume = 0 AllSongs[i]:Stop() end if fakeMic ~= nil then fakeMic.Transparency = 1 end if BBAnim ~= nil then BBAnim:Stop() end end
-- Connect our function to the Tool's Activate and other interfaces Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent;
local stillEquipped = true function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
